snippet: The Republic of this morning advocates harmony on the question of the Whig candidate for President, and denies all feelings of preference between Scott, Webster, Fillmore, or any other distinguished Whigs....
lead_paragraph: The Republic of this morning advocates harmony on the question of the Whig candidate for President, and denies all feelings of preference between Scott, Webster, Fillmore, or any other distinguished Whigs.

headline.main: From Washington--The next Presidency--Daniel Webster--Return of Mrs. Fillmore &c.
